name: Hare Chain
description: $HareChain is the first public chain of meme coins in the cryptographic field, and will also become the home and leading coin of Hare in the world. HareC is open to everyone in the world, and anyone can participate in becoming a node on the public chain. They can read data, send transactions, compete for accounting, and transactions can be effectively confirmed. All nodes participating in the public chain can freely connect according to system rules. Into the network, it is not controlled, and the nodes work based on the consensus mechanism to build trust. We care about environmental protection and are passionate about changing the world: enter our website, complete environmental tasks and upload videos every day, and you will get bnb rewards.
